programme.desc: Sharks, Sharks, Sharks - Max and Dad are excited to continue their tradition of watching a sharks TV special together, but this year Sharkdog wants to be included.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Sharkdog Home Alone - When the Fishers go to the movies, Sharkdog is left home alone for the first time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep412
programme.desc: Santa's Grotto - Peppa and George and their friends go to see Father Christmas. Peppa asks for a very special doll as a present, but will Father Christmas be able to deliver it to her?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep126
programme.desc: Snow - It is snowing, so Peppa and George go outside to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep250
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Birthday - Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza / Bread - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil! // Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Father Christmas! / We promise, Papa - Barbapapa tells his children about his adventurous youth... and how during a trip on the ice floe, he met Father Christmas. // When he sees the barbababies wasting water, Barbapapa takes them aside to tell them a funny story.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep723
programme.desc: Magic Spell Mayhem - When a magic potion turns Crusher into a chicken, it's up to Blaze and AJ to collect three incredible potion ingredients and change him back into a Monster Machine...Before he's a chicken forever!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep626
programme.desc: Christmas Special - It's Christmas Eve and Blaze, AJ, Crusher, Pickle, and all their other friends are helping Santa ready his sleigh for delivery.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep301
programme.desc: Pups Find a Genie / Pups Save a Tightrope Walker - Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes! // Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep717
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bah Humdinger - Mayor Humdinger is being very naughty on Christmas Eve and it's up to the Paw Patrol to help Santa and save Christmas.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Locked Out on Christmas Day / Paddington Feels the Music - It's Christmas day & the Browns get locked out. Will they get in in time for dinner & still have a merry Christmas? // It's the Windsor Gardens Parade & Paddington has to lead it when Ms. Potts gets injured. Can Simi help him find the beat?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep124
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Christmas Show / The Crew Builds A Giant Sled Ramp - Happy Holidays from Rubble & Crew and Truffles the pig, stars of Builder Cove's first-ever Christmas show...on ice! // When their winter day is snow-free, Rubble & Crew work to make all of Lucas and Lily's snow sledding dreams come true.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Croc-A-Bye Baby / Wanna Eampaada? / If The Boot Fits / Piata Party - Dora and Boots babysit some rowdy crocs. // Dora and Boots get the Troll to try an empanada at Benny's stand. // Boots tries new wacky new boots that Tico invented. // The twins have their first piata party, but no one can figure out how to open it.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep725
programme.desc: Super Smash Race - Get ready to crash and bash, 'cause today is the SUPER SMASH RACE! But when Crusher cheats and sends Zeg and Blaze far away, it's up to Blaze to help Zeg get back to the race, so he can slam and wham his way to a SMASH-tacular finish!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Pancakes / S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. // Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Fishy Force / Superhero Training Day - Vola, Goldie, Chucks, and Hank feel left out when they learn that Baby and William have been keeping a super secret. // To prepare for their first big TV interview, Fishy Force trains to be just like their favorite comic book heroes.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Home Sweet Sharkdog - Max's new best friend, Sharkdog, comes home with him, but keeping him a secret from his parents is a challenge.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Unfetch - When Sharkdog fetches items that belong to the residents of Foggy Springs, Max needs to help him return them all before anyone notices.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Sharkdoghouse - Max needs to create a permanent home for Sharkdog and he knows that his best friends, Olivia and Royce, are just the people to help him.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Sharkdog Digs In - Dad desperately wants to win Garden of the Year but when Sharkdog destroys the garden right before judging, the Sharkpack needs to step in and put it all in order.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1014
programme.desc: Charger's Christmas Adventure / Pups Save Great Uncle Smiley's Cup - Charger helps the Paw Patrol rescue Santa and his helpers when a blizzard at the North Pole threatens Christmas. // Mayor Humdinger enlists Digi & Tal to help him win a hockey game, it's up to the pups to undo the mayhem the team causes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep421
programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Turtles - Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep212
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Ballpark / The Crew Builds A Surf Bridge - When Rubble's favorite baseball star Aaron Judge can't get out of town to the home run derby, Rubble & Crew build a stadium to hold the derby right in Builder Cove! // Surf's up for Rubble & Crew! Well, if they can get over the super hot sand, it is.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Treasure Hunt - Grandpa Pig hides some treasure in his garden, and when Peppa and George come, they have to look for it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep525
programme.desc: Mr Potato's Christmas Show - Hoor-oink! It's Christmas, and Peppa's daycare is going to the theater to see a special play about the holiday. Some people have never been to a theater before.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep413
programme.desc: Santa's Visit - Peppa and George wake up very early on Christmas morning. Has Santa delivered the presents they want?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep245
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Pig - Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pigs boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Collection - Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Tiny Chef's Marvelous Mish Mesh Special - It's the Mish Mesh Special! Chef and friends host a celebration of everyone's favorite holiday traditions. Chef makes his marvelous Mish Mesh cookies, saving one to give to Santa. The only problem is, Chef forgot to send Santa his invitation letter!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep104
programme.desc: S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mystery Bandit - When a mysterious bandit makes off with Blazes metallic trophy, he must track down the culprit in this preschool whodunit!

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep126
programme.desc: It's Tree Time / Hamsters on Ice - The hamsters must save Christmas when a greedy rat steals Harry's cookies meant for Santa. // The hamsters try to recruit the fuzzy performers at a "Hamsters on Ice" live show.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Washing - Po eats Tubby Custard and gets a messy bib. Po washes the bib clean and hangs it out to dry before eating more Tubby Custard with Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Cake - Dee encourages a friend to say 'cake' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep37
programme.desc: The Zip Express - The friends board the Zip Express, a train that takes them across Pop Paper City. But when the friends face an unexpected challenge, it's unknown if the train will reach their destination on time.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Paperchase - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy has a pair of yummy green socks waiting for him. He eats one, but where is the second? He visits OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Perfect - For her Father's Day card, Bluey sets out to draw a picture of herself and her father together. While recalling her favourite memories of playing with Bandit, Bluey struggles with the idea that her drawing must be perfect. Chilli tries to convince Bluey t

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Explorers - While waiting to be picked up from school, Jack plays at being a sailor trying to find his way back home to Australia. Meanwhile, Jack's Dad has got lost on route to collect him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Petra, Jordan - Can the Go Jetters rescue the ancient city of Petra when Glitch causes in an earthquake?

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep50
programme.desc: The Paddy Fields of China - The Go Jetters swing into action when they discover that Glitch is using real landmarks for his crazy golf course.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Daddy Dropoff - Dad refuses to be late dropping off Bluey and Bingo at kindy and school, but the girls make Dad play so many games, they quickly derail his plan.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Favourite Thing - When Bluey accidentally makes Bingo upset playing a game at dinner, she will do anything to make her happy again - even changing the rules of the game. But nothing seems to work.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep36
programme.desc: It's time to build a snowman! - It's a snowy day and JoJo and Gran Gran go to the park to build a snow panda!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep18
programme.desc: The Christmas Tree Express - It is Christmas on the Island of Sodor. Thomas, Toby and Rheneas are shunting in the Blue Mountain Quarry. Thomas says he is going to pick up a Christmas tree that the Logging Locos have brought from Misty Island.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S15 Ep19
programme.desc: Tree Trouble - It's the winter holidays and Dowager Hatt declares a competition to see who can find the tallest and grandest Christmas tree on Sodor. Thomas leads the chase to find the best tree.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep2
programme.desc: Henry's Magic Box - All of the engines become excited as the winter holidays arrive. Henry goes to deliver a special package to a field; he wonders what it contains.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep12
programme.desc: Salty's Surprise - It is Christmas time on the Island of Sodor and Edward and Thomas are at Brendam Docks, where Thomas is shunting trucks of presents. Salty trundles over and admires the presents train before Thomas takes it to Knapford.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Christmas Swim - The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Say Snow Go - No matter how fast he clears the path, it just keeps snowing on a Citizen Po's garden!

programme.desc: The Snowman Badge - The Squirrels are playing outside in the snow and decide to build a snowman.

programme.desc: Hey Duggee: Christmas Special 2020 - Duggee's old friend Clarence has lost his Christmas cheer so the Squirrels decide to help.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Tinsel Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels play hide and seek. Duggee counts while the Squirrels hide.

programme.desc: Best of Madison Square Garden - New York Citys Madison Square Garden has hosted some of the best fights in UFC history. On this episode of UFC Unleashed, weve got a collection of bouts coming from the Mecca of combat sports. Featuring Zhang Weili, Georges St-Pierre, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep910AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep604FighterFocusJonathanPearceDayOneAlexPereiraUltimateAccessRoyceGracieTake5SeanWoodson
programme.desc: Jonathan Pearce currently climbs the UFC featherweight rankings, after overcoming a vicious gym attack in 2014 that would leave him fighting for his life. UFC middleweight champion Alex Pereira revisits his UFC debut in Day One. Hall-of famer Royce Gracie sets out on a swimming journey through Gandy Beach for a charity event that gives back to fallen Navy seals and their families. Striking specialist Sean Woodson gives us his top 5 boxers in the UFC.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY - Nothing more satisfying than a flowing team move with the finish. 10 of the best plays from 22/23.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC301PantojavsErceg
programme.desc: UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja returns home to Brazil to defend his crown for the second time against surging Australian contender Steve Erceg in the main event, and Hall-of-Fame legend Jose Aldo comes out of retirement to face rapidly rising phenom Jonathan Martinez. Plus, Anthony "Lionheart" Smith vs Vitor Petrino and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep2
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep7
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC300PereiravsHill
programme.desc: Over 30 years in the making, UFC celebrates its 300th numbered event with 3 title fights and a stacked card. Alex Pereira defends his Light Heavyweight belt againt former champ Jamahal Hill, Zhang Weili puts her Strawweight title on the line against Yan Xiaonan in the first ever UFC China vs China championship bout, and Justin Gaethje battles Max Holloway to keep his coveted BMF belt. Catch all this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC 309: Jones vs. Miocic
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to the Worlds Most Famous Arena on Saturday, November 17, as Jon Jones defends his heavyweight title against Stipe Miocic in the highly anticipated main event of UFC 309 at Madison Square Garden in New York City. One of the greatest light heavyweights of all-time, Jones is on his way to repeating that success in his new weight class, but to cement that claim, he has to get by the man considered to be the best heavyweight to ever do it in Clevelands Miocic. Plus, a rematch fans have been waiting for comes to fruition in the Big Apple, as former lightweight champion Charles Oliveira faces off with Iron Michael Chandler.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep6
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
